title: Florida Braces for a Hurricane Forming in the Gulf of Mexico

title: Discounts Make a Comeback as Shoppers Get Picky About Spending

title: Gunman Kills 3 in ‘Racially Motivated’ Shooting in Jacksonville. Here’s What to Know
